resources.string: I code in several different languages like C, Java, Kotlin, and Python. I am into App Dev. Other interests include Cyber Security, and AI &ML. - I am confident in my ability and extremely motivated to develop new skills for the upgradation of my professional caliber. - My goals are oriented toward making this world a better place. - Apart from the technical skills I have achieved so far, I greatly look forward to working in the domain of Cyber Security. - I am open to new people and perspectives.
